snippet.title: PAYDAY 2: Hostile Takeover Heist - Trailer
snippet.description:
#PAYDAY2 #DLC #HostileTakeoverHeist

The Hostile Takeover heist is out! Take off towards Texas and set your sights on corporate espionage and sabotage of the highest order! This newest heist is highly focused on choice. Choose in what order to complete objectives and watch the chaos unfold!

Hostile Takeover Heist Store Page: https://pd2.link/HostileTakeoverHeistYS
Hostile Takeover Bundle Store Page: https://pd2.link/HostileTakeoverBundleYS 
Sign Up for Nebula Account here: 
https://pd2.link/HostileTakeoverNebulaY
